name: Quirky Space
description:
This is a small experiment. I simply had an idea about the Cosmic Turtle and thought it would be cool if you could fly around and see other procedurally generated terrains on other turtles backs.

Controls: 
Mouse and Keyboard.
WASD for typical movement. Space to fly Up and left ctrl to fly down.
Enter or P to open the menu.

There is a small editor in the menu where you can change how the island on the back of your turtle.

Disclaimer:
I am aware that the turtle model's are actually tortoises cause they have legs, not fins. But I pose a question to you. If a Giant Space turtle was flying though an empty void, would it need fins to manoeuvre around nothing or legs to push off objects?
